title: Incident Timeline Analysis
description: An investigator must create a master timeline of an entire security breach by combining artifacts from disk, memory, and network forensics.

tasks.description: Collect all forensic reports and evidence from the different investigation tracks (disk, memory, network).
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator gathers all available evidence into a central location.

tasks.description: Extract key timestamped events from all evidence sources (e.g., file creation times, process execution times, network connection times).
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator extracts hundreds of time-stamped artifacts.

tasks.description: Create a single, correlated timeline that tells the complete story of the attack, from initial compromise to final data exfiltration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator produces a definitive 'story' of the breach that can be used for reporting and lessons learned.
